data.title: Nice pool hall.
data.text: Billco's is a fun place to shoot pool, play darts, eat or have a drink.  The pool tables are rented by the hour.  The food and drinks are good; many beers available on tap.  On certain evenings they feature live music which is loud but the space is small so it must be expected.

data.title: Have a beer, play some pool at Bilcos
data.text: I hope this place always stays in Napa. It is hard to find a just a normal "joe" place in Napa Valley where you can just relax and have a beer and play some pool. I love it here, brings me back a decade or two, They also serve food.

data.title: Locals Bar
data.text: If you get tired of tasting wine try Bilco's. Vast array of beer on tap. Not the prettiest of places but the equivalent of a local bar/club in UK.

data.title: Best beer selection that I found
data.text: I do not know if there is better in Napa, but they do have an awesome selection. When they say 60 taps of beer, they don't have 30 taps of crap and then some good ones. It is all good. They keep the crap in bottles. Great place for beer.  One note. It is a pool hall. There is smoke. Get beyond that and it's awesome.

data.title: Good times at local dive
data.text: We stopped in to play some darts and have a few beers to enjoy Napa like the locals.  The bar was exactly as we anticipated- great spot to play darts of billards, no frills.  Billco's had a very substantial beer list and we had a fun time playing darts and chatting with new friends.

data.title: Nice place for pool
data.text: We went during Bottle rock after 10pm and it was easy to find parking and to get a pool table. There was a cover but when we left after 12 there wasn't which kinda sucked, also if they expect to have a large crowd they need to have a few more bar tenders or a bigger area for people not playing pool as everyone has to crowd around the bar. For those not from California the pricing is different and the price first depends on how many people are playing and that determines how much it is per an hour.

data.title: A local spot for drinking beer and shooting pool
data.text: If you want to be surrounded by the locals, stop by here.  We came to play some pool and ended up having some of the beers that they offer.  The bartender was freaking hilarious and made our night more entertaining (he may have been the manager or owner).  It's a perfect spot if you're just looking to chill for the evening.

data.title: Good Times
data.text: A Local Pool hall, bar. But if all the locals go and they are pretty busy all of the time them what should that tell you. Good Times, great beer, so many beers you could not taste them all or can U

data.title: Pleasant Surprise
data.text: I usually don't write a review for a bar and billiards establishment but this place was great. Billco's had a large selection of beers which did not disappoint. They also had a nice variety of bar food options. Everyone in our party was pleased with their food selection. However what caused me to write a review for Billco's was their employees. Our group could not have been treated better at any other place.

data.title: Fabulous Food!
data.text: Being vegetarian usually means a basket of french fries when eating pub food but not here.  I had probably the best veggie burger ever!  Not your typical bean burger either.  My husband challenged the cook to come up with something to meet his spicy pallet and was not disappointed with the chicken sandwich.   Everyone was so welcoming and there was such a variety of brews so we actually hung out and played a few games of pool.  If I lived in the area, this would certainly be our spot for a night out!

data.title: Great craft beer selection at old fashion billiard bar
data.text: This is not for the uppity folks who tour Napa. Just a fun beer joint located in the middle of downtown.

data.title: Not a friendly place
data.text: Went there after an exelent dinner, not tourist friendly. Stay away unless local i think. Worst service ever.

data.title: Beers
data.text: Good beers.  60 beers on TAP.  Me and my girlfriend drink a lot kind beers and we have a good treatment.

data.title: Still the best cheeseburger in town
data.text: A wall full of craft microbrew drafts and a fridge full of other bottled ales.  Darts, billiards, and the best cheeseburger in Napa Valley.  This is one of the few late night neighborhood spots in Napa.  Friendly service as well.

data.title: Late night stop after a wedding
data.text: Came here after a wedding that was held in Sonoma.  We stayed at the andaz and it was a quick walk over.  We were amazed by how many taps were available it was hard to make a decision.  We ordered a bunch of food which was good but then my husband got sick when we got back to the room.  He thinks it was the sliders.  Typical bar food so not anything fancy.  There is a patio outside where people were smoking just outside the door so the smell was lingering inside.  This is a great place to get lots of craft beer which is a big difference from the rest of Napa

data.title: Go here for craft beer.
data.text: Great place to get away from the wine and enjoy craft beer. Best selection in Napa from what I could tell. Ask about the secret cooler if you are looking to take a nice six pack home with you. Didn't eat here, but the menu looked like typical pub food.

data.title: Not for the faint of heart BUT you want draft beers
data.text:
Remember this is a pool hall / darts..

Great local place.. you want to try draft beers this is the place

I would not recommend this as a Napa wine place!.

Good beer , bar food. 
Local place where kids are welcome (if they can hold a cue)

Lots of fun

data.title: Great local pool hall
data.text: Very good selection of beers. i have spent a lot of time on a stool there just drinking my way thru the selection. Table are clean and level. You can always get in have a beer and a game and not feel rush or crowded.

data.title: Beer!
data.text: The beer selection is incredible!  60 different beers on tap (well 56: 2 Guinness taps and 3 ciders) and probably over 100 more in the back.  More of a locals spot with good bar food, darts, billiards.  A great change of pace from the upscale Napa scene.

data.title: Great beer selection
data.text: I found this place on Untappd and enjoyed beers from The Lost Abbey and High Water Brewing. We didn't play pool or darts but they seemed to have plenty of tables and boards available.
